  • havoc.autoval.tests.dc_integration.chef.cheftest

Source code for havoc.autoval.tests.dc_integration.chef.cheftest

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_base import TestBase
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.host import Host
import havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.chef_utils as chef_utils
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.system.system_config import SystemConfig



[docs]class ChefTest(TestBase):


[docs]    def execute(self):
        self.log_info("Running Chef test")

        cfg1 = SystemConfig.config_check(self.host)
        self.validate_condition(cfg1, "Config check")

        chef_exc = chef_utils.last_chef_exception(self.host)
        self.validate_condition(
            chef_exc is None,
            "Checked last Chef run on %s, no failures: %s" % (
                self.host.hostname, chef_exc
            )
        )

        self.log_info("Running Chef now")
        chef_out = chef_utils.run_chef(self.host)
        self.validate_condition(chef_out is not None, "Verify that Chef executes")
        chef_exc = chef_utils.last_chef_exception(self.host)
        self.validate_condition(
            chef_exc is None,
            "Checked new Chef run on %s, no failures: %s" % (
                self.host.hostname, chef_exc
            )
        )

        cfg2 = SystemConfig.config_check(self.host)
        SystemConfig.compare_configs(cfg1, cfg2)
        self.validate_condition(
            True, "Compared configs before / after Chef run"
        )




[docs]def main():
    test = ChefTest()
    test.lifecycle()



if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
